Package Model

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Comments
    A Comments object contains the user id,master comments id,sub comments id, sub comments title and body,a picture if it has date,location of the comments posted, a userName which published this comment
    CommentsModel
    CommentsModel controller for upload comments
    CommentUser
    this class is making profile for the user
    FavouriteComment
    Used to store each single comment for favourite and saving function
    FavouriteModel
    Used to store each favourite
    IDModel
    Use this class to construct a IDModel
    SaveFavourite
    use this class if you want to get distance for offline comments
    SubCommentModel
    Subcomments controller for internet upload and download
    UserModel
    The model which will store all users information in single phone
